review: Really good version 1. Snappy UI. Buckets of content and apps. Great hardware.If I was to have any gripes (or more like things that can easily be fixed with the existing hardware) on the current version as it stands: - The bluetooth remote can be slow to connect - There needs to be a phone app that can be used as a remote to bypass the given one (handy with children) - Voice Search needs to be extended out to all apps and their content - Manual DNS settings should be allowed in WiFi connection - Pre-fetching content should be a choice (for people with data caps)
